greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Replace n with concatenation of its prime factors in decreasing order.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..20000
mathematica: Table[FromDigits[Flatten[Table[#[[1]],#[[2]]]&/@ Reverse[ FactorInteger[ n]]]],{n,60}] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Aug 29 2016 *)
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jul 19 2003
ext: More terms from Christopher N. Swanson (cswanson(AT)ashland.edu), Jul 22 2003
